body.p:
Bypass procedure is illustrated in . The load is assumed to be powered by Source 1.
Open Source 2 input MCCB.
Rotate and remove the key from the Source 2 input MCCB; insert it in the Source 1 BypassMCCB and turn the key.
Verify key 3 is in Bypass 1. (If key 3 is located in Bypass 2, remove it and insert it in Bypass1.)
Close Source 1 Bypass MCCB; because the MCCB closes “around” the power switchelement, bypass is transparent to the load.
Open Source 1 input MCCB.
Open the isolation MCSW(s): STS switching logic is bypassed.
